abilities.name: Shadow Release
abilities.description: When the user is knocked unconscious or defeated, all stolen shadows are released and return to their original owners.
abilities.limitations: Loss of consciousness forces the release of all stolen shadows

keyMoments.title: All Shadows Return Worldwide
keyMoments.description: Following Moria's defeat, all shadows he had stolen are released and return to their original owners across the world, freeing countless victims.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the automatic release mechanism of the Kage Kage no Mi when the user is defeated.

reveals.information: All stolen shadows automatically return to their owners when Moria is defeated or loses consciousness

abilities.name: Paw-Paw Shockwave
abilities.description: Kuma can launch paw-shaped shockwave blasts from his palms that can send targets flying with tremendous force and create devastating impacts.
abilities.limitations: Requires use of the paw pads on his palms

keyMoments.title: Kuma Removes His Gloves
keyMoments.description: Kuma removes his gloves to reveal the paw pads on his palms, preparing to use his Nikyu Nikyu no Mi powers against the Thriller Bark survivors.
keyMoments.significance: The removal of gloves signals Kuma is about to use his full Devil Fruit capabilities.

keyMoments.title: First Display of Paw Shockwave Blasts
keyMoments.description: Kuma demonstrates his ability to launch paw-shaped shockwave blasts, sending multiple people flying with devastating force across Thriller Bark.
keyMoments.significance: First major offensive demonstration of the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi's destructive capabilities.

reveals.information: Can create and launch paw-shaped shockwave attacks that cause massive destruction
